feed.title: SAP Community - ABAP RESTful Application Programming Model
feed.subtitle: ABAP RESTful Application Programming Model Q&A in SAP Community

entry.title: OData Services ABAP RESTful application programming model
entry.content:
Hi Everyone,

 

I’m working on the S4D400 exercise where we create a subpackage  ZS4D400 and copy the table  /LRN/S4D400_APT to our own package.

However, I noticed that my main package S4D400 doesn’t exist in my ABAP environment.

Should I create this package manually, or is it supposed to be pre-delivered by the system?

I need some suggestions how to find that package. so that I can create the application.

Thanks in advance
Sumanth.

entry.title: clean core proxy isn't commited
entry.content:
Hi experts,

I try to code my first clean core application using application job. In this app I create some orders. Therefore I made a proxy for BAPI_PO_CREATE1 (note 3496669). But for some reasons the bapi isn't commited by the framework (Fuba is called with destination none). Neither application job nor rap object create my order. The only thing that works is when I program a BAPI_TRANSACTION_COMMIT into the proxy. But that can't be right, can it? What do you think?

Thanks and regards
Bernd

entry.title: Display PDF document as RAP Odata V4 Web API output
entry.content:
Hello Experts,

I am trying to implement a requirement, in which I have to get the archived PDF documents (For Example : Delivery Notes attachment, Notification attachments) and display it as PDF Output to user via RAP OData V4 Web API. I tried to implement it with custom entity with corresponding logic in ABAP class using if_rap_query_provider~select and assigned Large Objects annotation to the stream data. However, I am getting error "The server does not support the functionality required to fulfill the request", when I add $value at the end of uri to display the document as shown in attachment bruno_return_2.jpg. 

Please help to get this resolved. 

Thanks in advance!

entry.title: IF_RAP_QUERY_PROVIDER~SELECT called two times causing issues
entry.content:
I built an RAP application with Header and Item using Custom Entities as I need to call external API for fetching the data.

The Select Query is called twice, once with Offset 0 and second with Offset 34. Upon Execution for the first time I have all the data fetched and I am setting the Number of Records Fetched and data. However, since the query is called twice, with offset greater than number of records, the select query is failing and throwing an error message.

Please help on how to prevent the error message

Below is my code

  METHOD if_rap_query_provider~select.
** Check if data is requested.
    DATA(lv_requested) = io_request->is_data_requested( ).
    IF lv_requested IS NOT INITIAL.
      DATA(lv_entity_id) = io_request->get_entity_id( ).
      CASE lv_entity_id.
** get the bank balance
        WHEN 'YYYYYYY'.
          get_YYYYYYY(
            EXPORTING
              io_request  = io_request
              io_response = io_response
          ).
** Get the Bank statement
        WHEN 'XXXXXXX'.
          get_XXXXXXX(
            EXPORTING
              io_request  = io_request
              io_response = io_response
          ).
        WHEN OTHERS.
      ENDCASE.
    ENDIF.
  ENDMETHOD.

**********  Entity Method logic
  METHOD get_YYYYYY.
**paging
    DATA(lv_offset) = io_request->get_paging( )->get_offset( ).
    DATA(lv_page_size) = io_request->get_paging( )->get_page_size( ).
    DATA(lv_max_rows) = COND #( WHEN lv_page_size = if_rap_query_paging=>page_size_unlimited
                                THEN 0 ELSE lv_page_size ).

** Get the search criteria
    DATA(lv_sql_filter) = io_request->get_filter( )->get_as_sql_string( ).

**search string
    DATA(lv_search_string) = io_request->get_search_expression( ).

    SELECT ******<Logic>
      INTO TABLE _Itab
      UP TO _max_rows ROWS OFFSET _offset ##TOO_MANY_ITAB_FIELDS.
    IF sy-subrc NE 0.
      ls_message-msgid = gc_msgid.
      ls_message-msgno = '042'.
* No Data found for the given criteria
    ENDIF.

    IF ls_message IS NOT INITIAL.
      RAISE EXCEPTION TYPE zcx_exception
        EXPORTING
          textid = ls_message.
    ENDIF.

    IF io_request->is_total_numb_of_rec_requested( ).
      io_response->set_total_number_of_records( lines( lt_itab ) ).
    ENDIF.

    io_response->set_data( lt_itab ).

  ENDMETHOD.

Service Definition

entry.title: RAP I_SalesOrderTP lock error on Update
entry.content:
Hello,

in a RAP behavior determination I'm trying to modify the scheduling line of an sales order item:

MODIFY ENTITIES OF i_salesordertp

    ENTITY SalesOrderScheduleLine

      UPDATE FROM VALUE #( for k in dlv(

         SalesOrder = k-SalesOrder

        SalesOrderItem = k-SalesOrderItem

      SchedulineLine   = k-SalesOrderSchedLIne

     RequestedDeliveryDate = k-DeliveryDate

   %control-RequestedDeliveryDate = if_abap_behv=>mk-on ))

    FAILED data(ls_failed)

For a single entry it works but if I have more than one entry in table dlv I got an an error in table ls_failed for each entry like the following:

I replicate the same code in an abap program ( SE38 ). I got the same problem. If I split the modifications using multiple modify statement and put a commit entities between each modify it works correctly.

Any suggestions ?

entry.title: 403 Forbidden Error in BTP ABAP Trial Environment — Request Blocked by UCON
entry.content:
Hello Experts,

From the last 4-5 days i am facing the below issue: 

I  have connected BTP Trial account to Eclipse ADT. I don't have access to SAP GUI. While previewing the service url I am getting this error. I am frustrated from the last 4 days. Stuck to only this. can you please give me an appropriate solution. I have deleted the BTP trial account and generated a new instance still not resolved, even I have created a new workspace in Eclipse that also doesn't solve the issue. Previously I used to see the preview of the app and service url. I have attached the error screenshot below. Note: My BTP Trial account is still active. I'm using BAS and it's working perfectly.

entry.title: Using #LINEITEM_REFERENCE does not display table for child view in object page
entry.content:
I have a root view for SalesOrder and child view SalesOrderItem connected to each other via composition. I also have a projection view on top of each of root view and child view. Then I have metadata extensions for both the projection views.

Embedding the screenshots here , somehow the embedding the screenshots was not working in original post so now doing here.

Root View YR_SORD_TEST having composition to child YI_SALESORD_ITM_RM

 

Child View YI_SALESORD_ITM_RM associated to parent YR_SORD_TEST

Projection view on top of Root view

Projection View on top of Child View

Metadata extension for Header projection view.

   Red circle shows #LINEITEM_REFERENCE which I want to show the items (child ) as a table in object page

Metadata extension for child projection view

  Using 2 fields from child table which I intend to show as table in object page.

Output

List page for header is shown below

Once clicked on the line item, object page is shown with elements but the fields marked for LINEITEM_REFERENCE are not shown from item view in a table

Regards

Amber

entry.title: Segment '_records' not allowed in the current context
entry.content:
Hello experts,

In my effort to learn ABAP RAP I'm trying to created simple Job Application Management app which maintains information about applications from the point of view of the applicant. To its root cds view ZI_APPLICATION are associated contact person data (ZI_PERSON), company data (ZI_COMPANY) and composed ZI_RECORDS (as _records) to maintain some records (e.g. date of interview, its result etc.)

When I try to create new record to an application, I get "Segment '_records' not allowed in the current context" error, yet I am able to create the record. Can anybody explain me how to rid of this error?

I inspected the ZFE_TRAVEL_001000 example present on the server which has sort of similar structure (associations and composition) but even if I created as similar structure (cds, annotations, classes etc.) as possible I still cannot make it work. Unfortunately I could not find more information about this error.

Your insight will be much appreciated.

In the attachment you can see CDS definitions, behavior definition and bdef implementation class. Let me know if you need more information.

entry.title: abstract entity with optional/nullable fields
entry.content:
Hello,

I am on premise SAP HANA 2023.

In my behavior definition I have declare an action with parameter deep structure. I have created a root abstract entity and a child one. In the behavior of the abstract entity I have added the word "with control" so the fields of the deep parameter are marked as optional. I have still an issue because the fields are not nullable. Is there a way to set them 'Nullable'?

Thank you for your help.

regards

Christophe

entry.title: Guidance Needed on Linking RFC Function Module Table to Entity Set in OData Service
entry.content:
Dear @OdataExperts,

Please help on below query.

I have created an OData service using the Import → RFC option, and the mapping has been successfully completed with the relevant RFC Function Module. I would now like to understand how to link the Function Module's table (/IWBEP/I_SBD_DS) to a specific Entity Set table (/IWBEP/I_SBO_ES).

Could someone please guide me on how to achieve this?

Written select query:

SELECT a~function_name
INTO TABLE @DATA(lt_table)
FROM /iwbep/i_sbd_ds AS a
JOIN /iwbep/i_sbo_es AS b
ON a~project = b~project
AND a~node_uuid = b~node_uuid
WHERE b~project = 'ZTEST'
AND b~name = 'testSet'.

@thomas_jung@naimesh_patel @AshwinDutt  SAP NetWeaver Application Server for ABAP NW ABAP Gateway (OData) OData 

Thank you in advance!

entry.title: RAP API with custom static action: How can I set optional parameters?
entry.content:
Hi everyone,

I defined a API using RAP. Here below all the details.

ROOT ENTITY

@AccessControl.authorizationCheck: #NOT_REQUIRED
@EndUserText.label: 'Sales Report (SLSRPT from Lobster)'
@Metadata.ignorePropagatedAnnotations: true
define root view entity ZLBSR_R_SALES_DATA
  as select from zsd_lbstr_slsrpt
{
  key uuid               as UUID,
      erdat              as CreationDate,
      erzet              as CreationTime,
      ernam              as CreationUser,
      status             as Status,
      bstkd              as CustomerReference,
      bstdk              as CustomerReferenceDate,
      ean11              as ArticleEAN11,
//      @Semantics.quantity.unitOfMeasure: 'QuantityUnitOfMeasure'
      kwmeng             as Quantity,
      vrkme              as QuantityUnitOfMeasure,
      vdatu              as RequestedDeliveryDate,
      sold_to_party_gln  as SoldToPartyGLN,
      ship_to_party_gln  as ShipToPartyGLN,
      @Semantics.systemDateTime.localInstanceLastChangedAt: true
      local_last_changed as LocalLastChanged,
      @Semantics.systemDateTime.lastChangedAt: true
      last_changed       as LastChanged
}

BEHAVIOUR DEFINITION

managed implementation in class zbp_lbsr_r_sales_data unique;
strict ( 2 );

define behavior for ZLBSR_R_SALES_DATA alias SalesData
persistent table zsd_lbstr_slsrpt
lock master
authorization master ( instance )
etag master LastChanged
{
  field ( readonly )
  UUID,
  CreationDate,
  CreationTime,
  CreationUser,
  Status,
  LastChanged,
  LocalLastChanged;
  field ( numbering : managed )
  UUID;

  create;
  update;
  delete;

  determination fill_administrative_data on save { create; }

  static action deleteWithFilters parameter ZLBSR_D_DELETION_FILTERS;

  mapping for zsd_lbstr_slsrpt
    {
      UUID                  = uuid;
      CreationDate          = erdat;
      CreationTime          = erzet;
      CreationUser          = ernam;
      Status                = status;
      CustomerReference     = bstkd;
      CustomerReferenceDate = bstdk;
      ArticleEAN11          = ean11;
      Quantity              = kwmeng;
      QuantityUnitOfMeasure = vrkme;
      RequestedDeliveryDate = vdatu;
      SoldToPartyGLN        = sold_to_party_gln;
      ShipToPartyGLN        = ship_to_party_gln;
      LocalLastChanged      = local_last_changed;
      LastChanged           = last_changed;
    }
}

ABSTRACT ENTITY ZLBSR_D_DELETION_FILTERS

@EndUserText.label: 'Sales Report - Filters for deleteWithFilters action'
define abstract entity ZLBSR_D_DELETION_FILTERS
{
  CustomerReference : bstkd;
  SoldToPartyGLN    : zlbstr_slsrpt_sold_to_prty_gln;
  ShipToPartyGLN    : zlbstr_slsrpt_ship_to_prty_gln;
}

The 3 fields CustomerReference, SoldToPartyGLN and ShipToPartyGLN are all character fields with different lenghts.

When I send a POST request for the action deleteWithFilters I have always to declare the value for all the 3 parameters. I could always declare the ShipToPartyGLN as empty (like "ShipToPartyGLN": "") and that works but I'd like to set the ShipToPartyGLN as optional in order to avoid the caller to set this parameter everytime. How can I do that?

 

Thanks!

entry.title: ABAP Cloud trail account: Getting error when doing preview of application
entry.content:
I am trying to create a new services for RAP app on CDS, but preview of app is not working, this issue is only for newly created service, old services are working fine. The error in Feeder is :

entry.title: SAP RAP & Analytical List Page - How to group and sort by grouped summed values?
entry.content:
Hey developers!

 

I've just managed to develop my first Analytical List Page which consumes data from a RAP service. 

 

I'm curious how to group the values of the lineitems and sort them by the summarized value. The default sorting does not have any effect when the entries are grouped.

 

In below view, I've grouped my data based on the "rolename". Each rolename has multiple entries which all contain an integer value. 

The grouping already shows the summed values.

Although sorting descending is configured, the summed values per group are not sorted.

Is there any way to achieve this?

 

Greetings!

When i m clicking on service url its showing "403 Forbidden The request has been blocked by UCON. Server time: 2025-10-27 09:19:27" and metadata in rap application is also failing. Can you please let me know the root cause and solution.

BR,Shubh

entry.title: Displaying Serial numbers in custom cds views Report
entry.content:
Hello everyone,

I’m currently working on a custom CDS view/report in SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud and would like to display serial numbers (for materials) in the output. Could anyone please guide me on the best approach to achieve this? Specifically, I’m looking for:

  1. How to include serial numbers in custom CDS views (built in Eclipse ADT).
  2. Whether it’s possible to fetch and display them directly through released data sources or associations.
  3. Any alternative methods (e.g., using standard I_* views, extensibility options, or Fiori analytical queries) to display serial numbers in reports.

entry.title: Mass Upload functionality for a custom table in ADT
entry.content:
Hello Experts,

I’m trying to create a table in ADT and  generated an app from it to input data. I also want to add a mass upload functionality using Excel. I have a few questions regarding the best approach:

  1. Can I implement the Excel upload without using BAS, by using actions in the Behavior Definition?

  2. If I use BAS, can I start with a List Report template and later add the Excel upload functionality?

Could you please guide me on how this can be achieved?

SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition Research and Development  ABAP RESTful Application Programming Model SAP Business Application Studio

entry.title: abap rap managed scenario - deletion of associated entity - foreign keys etc.
entry.content:
Hello experts,

Can you explain me, how the foreign keys in db are expected to work in abap rap?

Use case: I am creating simple managed rap scenario for job application management. To each application can be associated company and contact person. Respective foreign keys are defined in the application db table as well. Records for company table are managed from separate rap/fiori application.

When I create a job application record with associated company I would expect the hana will prevent deletion of the company (because of the foreign key usage in application table). But I can delete the respective company ...

Am I missing anything?

Thank you in advance for your insight ...

Regards,

Radim

entry.title: With reference to PO how to create auto GRN using background job in sap public cloud(3SL)
entry.content:
Hello Experts,

I am working in an SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud (3-System Landscape) environment, and I have a requirement to automatically post Goods Receipt (GRN) with reference to a Purchase Order using a scheduled/background job.

In standard SAP Public Cloud, we already have the “Schedule Goods Receipt for Inbound Deliveries” job, but in my case the business requirement is to post GR directly from the Purchase Order (without using Inbound Delivery).

If anyone has implemented a similar solution in 3SL—such as creating a RAP background job, using a released API, or integrating through the Material Documents API—please share your experience or guidance.

Thank you!

entry.title: Looking to Borrow – SAP ABAP RAP 2025 (SAP Press Book)
entry.content:
Hi everyone 👋

I’m currently learning the SAP ABAP RESTful Application Programming Model (RAP) and was wondering if anyone has the ABAP RESTful Application Programming Model written by Lutz Baumbusch, Matthias Jäger, Michael Lensch. I’d love to borrow it for a short time to read and learn from it. I’ll take good care of it and return it soon.

Please DM me if you’re open to sharing or know where I can find a copy. Thanks in advance! 🙌

#SAPCommunity #ABAP #RAP #LearningTogether
